snippet: Secretary of Defense Leon E. Panetta said the example of the Libya war showed the need to cooperate on defense spending in order not to “hollow out” the NATO alliance.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Secretary of Defense Leon E. Panetta said the example of the Libya war showed the need to cooperate on defense spending in order not to “hollow out” the NATO alliance.

headline.main: Panetta Urges Europe to Spend More on NATO or Risk a Hollowed-Out Alliance
headline.print_headline: Panetta Urges Europe to Spend More on NATO or Risk a Hollowed-Out Alliance
headline.seo: Libya War Should Be Example for NATO, Panetta Says
